District 6
==========

Council Member Evan Weiss
-------------------------

![Weiss](https://www.plainviewtx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=2556)

Council Member Evan Weiss was elected to office in November 2018, re-elected in November 2020 and May 2024.  He currently serves as Mayor Pro Tem.

View [contact information](https://www.plainviewtx.org/Directory.aspx?EID=8).
